title: [Unturned 3.14.1.0] 更新记录
author: lichi2050
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2016-1-25 13:07 编辑 

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/news/?appids=304930
Unturned Forum: http://unturned-forum.com/threads/3-14-1-0-update-notes.4742/ 
部分翻译: http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-544528-1-1.html
3.14.1.0 Rocket: http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-543521-1-1.html


You can now take to the skies with airplanes and helicopters! Each official map has spawn points for one of each, so all you need to do is hunt them down, fill them up and take off without crashing in an explosive mess. Similarly to cars you can expand on the existing ones with in-game buildables, or create your own custom flying contraptions using mods! The documentation and workshop have been updated to accommodate these new vehicle types. 
你现在可以驾驶飞机和直升机征服天空！每一张官方地图都有一个飞行载具的生成点，你需要找到它们，将损坏的部分修改并加油. 
类似于车辆你可以修改游戏内已存在的，或者使用Mod制作属于你的飞行载具！游戏资料和创意工坊已经更新可以完美的适应这些新
的载具.

Additions/添加Added Sandpiper. [ID 92]加入载具Sandpiper(矶鹬). [ID:92]Added Huey. [IDs 93-94]添加载具Huey (休伊). [IDs 93-94]Added Skycrane. [ID 95]添加载具Skycrane(空中起重机). [ID:95]Added server name filter to list.可通过服务器名称搜索服务器列表.Added item search bar to inventory.背包内加入物品搜索栏Added option to disable inbound/outbound voice.添加可调整入站声音/出站声音按钮.Added ability to mute specific players.添加禁言功能（服务器禁言玩家）.Added ability to win arena as a group/team.竞争场模式添加队伍系统.Added more cover to Alpha Valley and Monolith.Alpha Valley 和 Monolith 地图增加更多的掩护点（竞争场地图）.Added arena wins stat and achievement.添加竞争场输赢数据统计和成就.Added equilateral/right triangles. [IDs 1144-1155]添加Equilateral/Right Triangles(等边三角形/直角三角形). [ID:1144~1155]Added PEI Arena map.加入 PEI Arena （PEI 竞争场）地图. （无名人的翻译“PEI大逃杀地图”其实也挺好~）
Improvements/优化
Improved red sights to use your crit color instead.优化瞄准颜色，会使用你选择的暴击颜色.Improved arena to allow skills upgrades.优化竞争场现在可升级技能.Improved some input fields to show hint.优化一些阻止显示暗示的字段.Improved map to scale Arena field area better.优化竞争场地图.Improved master server to return multiple versions.优化，现在主服务器可回滚多个游戏版本.
Tweaks/调整
Tweaked lobby to block outside entry.调整lobby（大厅）阻止其余入口.Tweaked field speed based on map size.调整场地加载速度（基于地图大小）.Tweaked sawed-off range/durability/spread.调整短管霰弹枪 范围/耐久/射程.Tweaked pillar/post supply cost.调整 墙壁/柱子 制作所需材质数量.Tweaked version display.调整 版本显示.
Fixes/修复
Fixed interacting with buildables on vehicles.修复在载具内可以与外面互动.Fixed jumping out of Arena lobby.修复可以跳出竞争场大厅.Fixed sleeping bags in Arena.修复竞争场睡袋.Fixed suiciding in safe zone.修复在安全区域自杀.Fixed full sabertooth ammo.修复剑齿虎（枪械）一直满弹药.Fixed arena clearing mythics.修复竞争场清理不明物.Fixed server password field size.修复服务器密码最大数量.Fixed belt on side of festive top.修复圣诞上衣的腰带.

如有错误，还望指出。
